title: FiveThirtyEight - Wikipedia
snippet: FiveThirtyEight won numerous awards, including Bloggie Awards for Best Political Coverage in 2008 and Best Weblog about Politics in 2009 as well as Webbies for Best Political Blog in 2012 and 2013. While under the ownership of ESPN in 2016, FiveThirtyEight won the Data Journalism Website of the Year award from the Global Editors Network.

title: Nate Silver - Wikipedia
snippet: On July 22, 2013, ESPN (a subsidiary of the Walt Disney Company) announced that it had acquired ownership of the FiveThirtyEight website and brand, and that "Silver will serve as editor-in-chief of the site and will build a team of journalists, editors, analysts and contributors in the coming ...

title: Publishers Daily: ABC News Buys 'FiveThirtyEight'
snippet: FiveThirtyEight, which covers sports, politics and science, will continue to provide data-driven sports coverage to ESPN, which just sold it to ABC. The new ownership means FiveThirtyEight will expand its political coverage under ABC News.

title: FiveThirtyEight joins ABC News - ABC News
snippet: ABC News announced today it has reached an agreement in principle to acquire the renowned data journalism organization FiveThirtyEight from ESPN.

title: Nate Silver â€“ FiveThirtyEight
snippet: Nate Silver founded and was the editor in chief of FiveThirtyEight.
